_comment: This is the sample JSON file. You must use this format for your JSON files as we will be using similar formats when marking your assignment. Anything starting with an underscore (like this _comment) should be ignored.
_levelNameComment: the name of your file that appears at the top left-hand corner of the window
_levelLifeCountComment: indicating how many lives the character has for this particular level
_stickmanSizeComment: Your main character can be tiny, normal, large, or giant. What pixel dimensions these match can be up to you.
_stickmanPosComment: Stickman should start at the x position indicated, with their y position being on your 'floor'. This must be a positive double.
_cloudVelocityComment: Clouds should move the given number of pixels per second. This must be a positive double.
_enemiesComment: enemies is a Map that contains every enemy name as its keys, and a 2-d array containing relevant information for each enemy as its value.
_platformsComment: platforms is also a map that contains the coordinates, width, and height of each platform in a seprate array. At this stage, the game has only one type of platform called NormalPlatform, but in the next stage, new types of platforms will be added.
_levelLengthComment: this indicated the length of a level. ie, when does the character reaches the end line.
